Logic & Deduction.name: The Number Weaver
Logic & Deduction.description: Test your mathematical prowess with this quiz! From square roots to decimals, this challenge will push your numerical reasoning skills to the limit. Can you unravel the patterns and find the solutions?

questions.text: What is the square root of 81 squared?
questions.hint: First calculate 81 squared, then find the number that, when multiplied by itself, equals that result.

questions.text: What kind of angle is formed where two perpendicular lines meet?
questions.hint: This angle measures exactly 90 degrees.

questions.text: In the card game blackjack, how much are a queen and a king worth-together?
questions.hint: In blackjack, face cards have a specific point value, and you need to sum them.

questions.text: Which of these sentences is written in the subjunctive?
questions.hint: The subjunctive mood expresses wishes or hypothetical situations, often using ‘were.’
